system.descriptor: The Creation of things from contracts to weapons to starships, as well as the recalling of knowledge related to the Trade. A Trade may earn additional Profit Factor when able to ply it.
system.uses:
Uses: Recall Knowledge (Free Action), Examine an Item (Full Action). Plenty of other uses depending on the Trade, up to the character's Imagination and the GM's Discretion.
Skill Groups: Archeologist, Armourer, Astrographer, Chymist, Cryptographer, Cook, Explorator, Linguist, Remembrancer, Scrimshawer, Shipwright, Soothsayer, Technomat, Voidfarer
